Sentencas: Cost-effective wet ceramic coating techniques for fabricating ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte anode-supported button cells were investigated in this study.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Aqueous ceramic slurries were prepared by ball milling and then used for Ni/ScCeSZ half cell fabrication by tape casting and spin coating.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Prepared cells were tested at operating temperature between 700 and 800 degrees C with a fuel composition of hydrogen:nitrogen 3:1 and air at the cathode.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The cell with a spin coated GDC film showed the maximum power density of 1.142, 1.012, 0.813 W.cm(-2) at 800, 750, and 700 degrees C, respectively.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was also able to produce power output around 0.7 W.cm(-2) for 500 h at 750 degrees C, which confirms the cell operational stability.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: More importantly, the GDC film prepared by spin coating effectively avoided the formation of the (Zr,Ce)O-2(-)
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: based solid solution at the ceria/zirconia interface compared with the other cells with the co-casted and sintered GDC film.
Titulo: Optimization of a ScCeSZ/GDC bi-layer electrolyte fabrication process for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
